errors.error_description: The note about fixing a boot issue incorrectly advises forcing SELinux relabelling in 'enforcing mode'. This is dangerous and incorrect; it should be done in 'permissive mode' first.
correction_candidates: force SELinux relabelling in permissive mode on your filesystem.
force SELinux relabelling in disabled mode on your filesystem.
force SELinux relabelling using restorecon on the filesystem.
errors.golden_answer: force SELinux relabelling in permissive mode on your filesystem.
